mapper.select: SELECT price_id as priceId, price_code as priceCode, order_id as orderId, payment_item as paymentItem, IFNULL(price_budget,0) as priceBudget, deadline, IFNULL(price_real,0) as priceReal, account, received_time as receivedTime, comment, summary, recorder, IFNULL(price_adjust,0) as priceAdjust, status, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, isdel FROM tm_price_record WHERE isdel = 0 and order_id = #{id};

SELECT cost_id as costId, order_id as orderId, agency_id as agencyId, payment_item as paymentItem, IFNULL(cost_budget,0) as costBudget, IFNULL(cost_real,0) as costReal, account, pay_time as payTime, comment, summary, recorder, IFNULL(cost_adjust,0) as costAdjust, status, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, isdel FROM tm_cost_record WHERE isdel = 0 and order_id = #{id};
